rows.intro_text: Take a moment to check in with yourself.
rows.feedback_happy: Wonderful, I am so happy things are going well.
rows.feedback_ok: Some days will have their challenges. That is okay. You are on the right path!
rows.feedback_sad: Sorry that things are difficult now. It is completely normal to struggle sometimes. Remember that you are not alone!
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: Let’s take a moment for YOU. Looking after yourself well starts with noticing how you feel.
rows.feedback_happy: Great! So good to hear you are in a positive space.
rows.feedback_ok: Things are not always easy. But that is how we can grow and learn every day!
rows.feedback_sad: Life can be hard. Whatever you are feeling, you can be proud of yourself for being here!
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: You matter! Take a moment to check in with yourself.
rows.feedback_happy: Great to hear that you are doing well. You are a wonderful parent!
rows.feedback_ok: Sorry that you are not having the best day. Well done for trying to figure everything out. Nobody has all the answers but you really do your best!
rows.feedback_sad: Sorry to hear that you are not having a good day. Well done for getting up every morning and trying again, even when you are tired. That is real courage and dedication!
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: Recognising how you feel helps you care for yourself well. You deserve it.
rows.feedback_happy: Wonderful, I am so happy! Keep up the good work.
rows.feedback_ok: Sorry that things are difficult. All families struggle. @global.app_name is here to help!
rows.feedback_sad: Whatever went ‘wrong’ today, let it go and try again tomorrow. It is okay!
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: Looking after yourself matters. And how you feel matters too!
rows.feedback_happy: Great! So good to hear that you are in a good space today. What a wonderful feeling!
rows.feedback_ok: Sometimes things go great. Sometimes they do not. And sometimes we do not quite know what to think... and that is totally okay! Remember that you are not alone.
rows.feedback_sad: Sorry that things are hard right now. You deserve good things and @global.app_name is here to support you every step of the way.
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: Caring for yourself is so essential. When you know how you feel, you can see what you need.
rows.feedback_happy: Wonderful, I am so happy things are going well. Keep up the good work.
rows.feedback_ok: We all have better and worse days. The fact that you are here shows courage and commitment!
rows.feedback_sad: Sorry that things are difficult now. It is completely normal to struggle sometimes. Remember that you are not alone!
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: Remember that YOU matter! Let’s check in with our emotions first.
rows.feedback_happy: Well done for recognising a positive feeling. I am happy to hear you are feeling well today!
rows.feedback_ok: Well done for recognising that you are not feeling great. Be kind to yourself, you deserve it.
rows.feedback_sad: Well done for recognising a difficult feeling. It is okay not to be okay sometimes. Remember @global.app_name is here to support you.
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: Self-care is a key parenting tool. It starts with recognising how we feel.
rows.feedback_happy: Great. And amazing that you are using this app – it shows your commitment as a parent. Make sure you give yourself credit and praise for what you are doing.
rows.feedback_ok: Every day has its highs and lows. Praise yourself for being here and trying – you are moving forward.
rows.feedback_sad: Sorry that things are difficult right now. Take a deep breath and know that you are valued.
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: Recognising how you feel is key to handling life well. Be real and kind to yourself.
rows.feedback_happy: You are a star. And you are making a real difference. You can be proud of yourself.
rows.feedback_ok: Everyone has good and bad days. Well done for using this app. It shows you are a committed parent. Remember to praise yourself for it!
rows.feedback_sad: Sorry that things are not easy today. All parents have these days. You are trying and moving forward!
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: Being a great parent also means taking time to care for yourself every day. It starts with recognising how you feel.
rows.feedback_happy: So good to hear you are feeling well today. You are incredible!
rows.feedback_ok: We all have days where we just don’t know. That is okay! You are here and that is what matters.
rows.feedback_sad: Being a parent can be hard. But you are here and that shows you want to keep improving things. That is a big accomplishment already!
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: Taking a moment for YOU makes a big difference for everyone!
rows.feedback_happy: Great that today is going well! What is one thing that has gone well today? Remember to praise yourself for it.
rows.feedback_ok: Every day has its good and hard parts. Praise yourself for everything you have done so far – you are amazing.
rows.feedback_sad: Sorry to hear you are feeling difficult feelings today. Well done for recognising those emotions and trying to be calm and kind to yourself. You are setting a great example for your family.
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: Looking after yourself well starts with noticing how you feel.
rows.feedback_happy: Fantastic! And well done for investing in yourself and your family – you have accomplished a lot.
rows.feedback_ok: Sorry that you are not having the best day. Well done for trying to figure everything out. @global.app_name is here to help.
rows.feedback_sad: Being a parent can be challenging. Take a deep breath and recognise all you have done for your family – you deserve praise!
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: Take a moment for yourself first.
rows.feedback_happy: It is great to hear you are feeling positive today. You make a real difference for your family!
rows.feedback_ok: Life has its great and hard moments – that is okay. You are on the right track.
rows.feedback_sad: It is normal to have hard days as a parent. Take a deep breath and know you are not alone!
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: Take a moment to notice how you are doing.
rows.feedback_happy: Great! So good to hear that you are in a good space today. What a wonderful feeling!
rows.feedback_ok: Some days will have their challenges. That is okay. You are on the right path!
rows.feedback_sad: Sorry that things are difficult now. It is completely normal to struggle sometimes. Remember that you are not alone!
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: There is no right or wrong way to feel. However you are feeling, it is okay.
rows.feedback_happy: Well done for recognising how you feel. Good to hear that you are feeling well today!
rows.feedback_ok: We all have good and hard days. Remember, you are the best parent for your teen and you deserve praise!
rows.feedback_sad: It can be hard to cope with everything happening in our lives. Remember, you are stronger than you may think!
rows.title: Check-In

rows.intro_text: Let’s take a moment for YOU. Looking after yourself well starts with noticing how you feel.
rows.feedback_happy: Amazing, life is the best when you're feeling good.
rows.feedback_ok: Everyone has times when they are not feeling good. This is completely normal. Hopefully you feel better soon.
rows.feedback_sad: It is part of life to have bad days. Always remember, tough times never last and tomorrow is another day!
rows.title: Check-In
